archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0859
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want access to the data associated with our systems by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
